## Academic integrity and collaboration

::: {.callout-warning appearance="minimal"}
### What is allowed vs not allowed
✅ **Allowed**
- Discussing concepts and approaches at a high level with classmates  
- Using course notes and posted examples  
- Studying together

❌ **Not allowed**
- Copying any part of another student’s written solution  
- Copying code, derivations, or calculations (even if you “understand it”)  
- Submitting work that is not fully your own
:::

If you collaborate, your submitted work must be written independently and reflect your own understanding.
